# routeros_interface_bridge_vlan (Resource)


```terraform
resource "routeros_interface_bridge_vlan" "bridge_vlan" {
  vlan_id = "50"
  bridge  = "bridge"
  tagged = [
    "bridge",
    "ether1"
  ]
  untagged = [
    "ether5"
  ]
}
```

- `bridge` (String)
- `tagged` (List of String)
- `untagged` (List of String)
- `vlan_id` (Number)

### Optional

- `disabled` (Boolean)

- `current_tagged` (List of String)
- `current_untagged` (List of String)
- `dynamic` (Boolean)
